So I've made a character and I set him to respond with a line of dialogue when asked about a certain book. The keywords I entered were "chemistry" and "book," being that it's a chemistry book. But when I ask him about, say, "babies" in the game, he responds with the dialogue I've written for when he is asked about the chemistry book. Turns out he mistakes ANYTHING for "chemistry book" as long as I write "Ask Mitch about ..." before it. Can this be fixed?

Edit: I found the "Script to run when asked about an unknown topic" option and added dialogue. He still yaps off about his chemistry book when I ask him about "cheese" and "jock itch."
